Review_Text: SpoilerFor anyone who has been watching this show in real time since the begining...this show is a great way to recap on the entire show in a single hour- long episode. The Daryl recap is probably the best episode of the three since he has been there since the very begining, unlike Maggie and Negan.

Review_title: It's fun to watch old events with your favorite actors.
Review_Text: The idea of the series is great and I hope that it will have a second season and that they will add more and more characters.
SpoilerIt is nice to follow the events of the old series with the actors themselves.

Review_title: Watch if you want to know about the characters more
Review_Text: The show includes four main characters from TWD: Maggie, Carol, Daryl and Negan. Carol and Daryl are two of the characters that are still alive since the Atlanta Camp. Maggie has her debut in S02 and Negan joined rhe show in season 6 finale. Each character has one episode to tell their journey since the outbreak began: how they managed to survive and what kind of person they became. Each episode is about 1 hour long, showing us their major breakthrough while they tried to survive. The show will be presented by interviews with the cast members playing the four characters. Listening to how they think about their own characters was very interesting and intriguing.

Review_title: Maggie is the only one I don't care about
Review_Text: Loved watching Carol, Negan and Daryl, as for Maggie, never liked her vengeful persona and so won't watch it. How the series made Maggie in-charge is beyond me.

Review_title: Pointless Recap Show; AMC Loves Money
Review_Text: Seriously, what was a point of this series? It's a pointless recap told through narratives by cast members. They overlap each other. Just watch the series instead of this drivel.
Just let it die already, I stopped watching this when they put a tiger in it and called someone Jesus.
